dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 ASTER and MODIS Fire Data Comparison, Dry Season 2001
title: SAFARI 2000 ASTER and MODIS Fire Data Comparison, Dry Season 2001
summary: These data relate to a paper (Morisette et al., 2005) that describes the use of high spatial resolution ASTER data to determine the accuracy of the moderate resolution MODIS active fire product. Our main objective was to develop a methodology to use ASTER data for quantitative evaluation of the MODIS active fire product and to apply it to fires in Southern Africa during the 2001 burning season. We utilize 18 ASTER scenes distributed throughout Southern Africa covering the time period 5 August 2001 to 6 October 2001.

cmr.ScienceKeywords1: EARTH SCIENCE@LAND SURFACE@SURFACE THERMAL PROPERTIES@LAND SURFACE TEMPERATURE

citation: Masuoka, E., D. Roy, R. Wolfe, J. Morisette, S. Sinno, M. Teague, N. Saleous, S. Devadiga, C.O. Justice, and J. Nickeson. 2010. MODIS Land Data Products: Generation, Quality Assurance and Validation. 11:509-531.

Morisette, J.T., L. Giglio, I. Csiszar, and C.O. Justice. 2007. Validation of the MODIS active fire product over Southern Africa with ASTER data. International Journal of Remote Sensing. 26(19):4239-4264.
